column1: WARNING: Disabling this without triggering it in your code will cause Klevu to stop working. Only change if you are certain you have the required customisation in place. JSv2 setting powerUp.catnav.
column2: WARNING: Disabling this without triggering it in your code will cause Klevu to stop working. Only change if you are certain you have the required customisation in place. JSv2 setting powerUp.catnav.

column1:
Native: Klevu will be disabled, and will not power the rendering or result ordering of your search results page.
Klevu JS Theme: Use Klevu's JavaScript Theme to render and order the results of your search results page. Recommended for best results.
column2:
Native: Klevu will be disabled, and will not power the rendering or result ordering of your search results page.

column1: Enable infinite scroll on search results landing page.
column2: Enable infinite scroll on search results landing page.

column1: Number of pixels from bottom of search results landing page that triggers infinite scroll. JSv2 setting search.infiniteScrollOffsetLanding.
column2: Number of pixels from bottom of search results landing page that triggers infinite scroll. JSv2 setting search.infiniteScrollOffsetLanding.
